Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/ Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark due to, event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark, due to event traffic at Clark/ Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier sick customer at Cumberland.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
